title: Weekly road fuel prices
publisher: Department for Business, Energy and Industrial Strategy
description: BEIS publishes road fuel price statistics providing average UK retail 'pump' prices on a weekly basis.
datasetNotes: On landing page there a number of spreadsheets in different formats. XML File looks to have a good structure but needs investigating
sizingNotes: Simple table structure,  with side notes, although there are a number of tabs for each year, it should be possible to obtain all of the information from the 'All years' tab
notes: Although not specifically Covid-19 the  spreadsheet may allow the impact of the pandemic to be derived.
